item.title: Matrix 718/723 in Linux
item.dc:creator: @Matheus_Ps Matheus Ps
item.description:
@Matheus_Ps wrote:

how can I make sure I could run the server matrix 718/723 on a linux?

Server RUN

@echo off @title EkoScape Server @echo Iniciando EkoScape Server "c:/program files/java/jdk1.7.0_05/bin/java.exe" -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -server -Xms512m -Xmx512m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause

Server Compiler

@echo off @title EkoScape Compiler Server @echo Iniciando EkoScape Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/Player.java @echo EkoScape Compiler Parte 1 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/Equipment.java @echo EkoScape Compiler Parte 2 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/Launcher.java @echo EkoScape Compiler Parte 3 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/dialogues/*.java @echo EkoScape Compiler Parte 4 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java @echo EkoScape Compiler Parte 5 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/content/*.java @echo EkoScape Compiler Parte 6 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp data/libs/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/net/decoders/handlers/*.java @echo Servidor EkoScape Acaba De Ser Compilado pause

Read full topic
